meanings.definition: A thick-walled sexual spore produced by certain algae and fungi.
meanings.sent1: The oospore is a protective structure formed by some types of fungi.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the oospore to understand the reproductive cycle of algae.
meanings.sent3: The oospore decided to wear an extra thick wall for the winter season.
meanings.sent4: The oospore stood strong like a fortress, protecting the genetic material inside.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the oospore looked like a tiny armored castle.

meanings.definition: A fertilized egg in certain parasitic protozoans.
meanings.sent1: The oospore of the parasitic protozoan is ready to develop into a new organism.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian examined the oospore under the microscope to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The oospore threw a party to celebrate its fertilization.
meanings.sent4: The oospore was a tiny powerhouse of potential, waiting to hatch into new life.
meanings.sent5: In the world of parasitic protozoans, the oospore symbolizes the beginning of a new generation.
